titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: 17 Dec = "Chancor"? s2: big blot in upper corner, probably things are blocked top line = mark after Ap. 15 summer address = "Palinuille"? address = "Peuie"?

body.ab:
1935 LE COEUR books: from Marseille Madame Tues. Fri_ 23 bis Jean-Dolent during vacation till Sept 15. 1v. 1m. Saint Pierre d'Albigny, Savoie 15 after Sept 15 Lyceé de Jeunes Filles dep. 30 5 April- Flush card 7 May May 9 9 May Lovely Lady May 27 Renewed May 8 - June 8 1935 15 May 27 to the Lighthouse 11 Jun 11 Jun Good earth 26 Renewed 8 June - 8 July 1935 15 26 Sons July 9
18 18 Renewed July 8 - Jan 8 1936 77v 18 July- North Italian Painters 7 Aug. 7 Aug. p. 2.20 Lost Girl 20- 20- p. 2.- Water Gipsies 6 Sept. 6 Sept p. 2.20 Tobit Transplanted 26 Sept 26 2,20 England my England 19 Oct Esther Waters 26- 19 Oct. p.3.20 Broome Stages 14 Nov. 26- p. 1.80 St Mawr 27 Nov. 14 Nov. p.1.60 Something childish 17 Dec. 27 " p. 1.60 Brook Keith Jan 8. 17 Dec p. 1.80 Wheels_ 14. Jan 8. p. 2.0 Breakfast in bed. Feb. 2. 9,60 Renewed Jan 18 - July 18 1936 (m.o. Feb 3 80v) owes postage 19,60 subsc 70 Feb 3 paid 80v 89 60 balance due: 9,60
p. 2.80 Lolly Willowes_ Ap. 15 Fountain Feb 24 March 20 p. 2f Old Wives Tale April 15 Wrote letter March 20 Ap. 27th April 15 2.00 Queen Victoria, Strachey (lost in post) pd 24 Way of all Flesh May. 19th 3.20 Strange Interlude June. 6. June 2. 2.00 Men like Gods SB wrote on June 2nd Jun 16
June. 10. 1.60 Bill of Divorcement. June. 29. June. 17. 2.20 Eminent Victorians July 30. June 24 2.00 Youth 15. Summer address. par Bourç - Dun Inferieur wrote to say how much she owe for book lost: 30.00 wrote July 23 July 15 Beyond the Mexique Bay Aug 24 Paid. Compte cheque (?) 110 frs. -Jan 18th 1937 owed 30.00. subscription 70.00. April 12th balance due 9.60. postage. 17.80 Paid bill + sub- mandat. 127.40 April 18 1937 73-90 balance due 17.40 Aug. 4. Hound of Spring. Sept 23 Shame the devil p. 3.20 Oct. 21. Oct 20 White Oaks p. 2.45. Nov. 23 Nov. 23. Elizabeth + Essex. p. 2.60 Jan 4. Dec. 31. It can't happen here p. 2.25 Feb. 16 Feb. 16. Third Act in Venice p. 2.00 April 10 sent bill Feb 16 12.50 sent letter + bill April 6th 1937
